Please check that this file exists and t: Molimo provjerite da taj dokument postoji i da je potreban disk učitan.
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Analizira sve sadržaje u kolekciji. Analiza dohvaća informacije o sadržaju koja olakšava Plexu da optimalnije reproducira sadržaj.
Cleans up the library database and ensur: Isprazni bazu knjižnice i osigurava da je dostupna čim prije je moguće. Ovo je osobito korisno kada dodate ili uklonite velik broj medija iz knjižnice.
The media server stores information abou: The media server stores information about your media to disk, as well as posters, artwork, and other media resources from the Internet. Running this task deletes any bundles which are no longer in use.
Plex organizes your library into section: Plex organizira vašu kolekciju u sekcije, te je organizira po tipu. Možete dodati koliko god sekcija želite, a možete imati i više sekcija istoga tipa.
Removes a library section and all items: Uklanja sekciju i sve stavke unutar nje. Ne briše medije sa diska. Ukoliko stavke dodate kasnije u budućnosti, ostati će i podaci o gledanju kao i ocjena.
Name: Ime
Forces a download of fresh media informa: Prisilno preuzimanje svježih informacija o medijima sa Interneta. Ovo može potrajati. Sva zaključana polja neće biti modificirana.
myPlex could not connect to your server: mojPlex se ne može spojiti na Vaš server
Ovaj media server je nedostupan za vas.
Please check that you have permission to: Please check that you have permission to access this media server.
By default the media server doesn't remo: Po standardnim postavkama medijski poslužitelj ne uklanja informacije sa medija odmah. Ovo pomaže ukoliko je disk privremeno odspojen. Kada ispraznite koš za smeće za sekciju, sve informacije o medijima koji nedostaju se brišu.
Unable to listen for events on {1}.
Plex channels give you access to online: Plex kanali pružaju Vam pristup online medijima sa raznolikih stranica. Možete pretraživati i instalirati te kanale iz svog Kanal Direktorija, ali krenite sa instaliranjem nekih istaknutih kanala.
There was a problem connecting your serv: Došlo je do problema prilikom spajanja na Vaš server.
Signing in with a free myPlex account gi: Signing in with a free myPlex account gives you access to more features, and can help your devices find each other.
Plex was unable to sign your server in t: Plex was unable to sign your server in to myPlex. Ensure that the server computer or device can access the internet.
You will not be able to stream media fro: You will not be able to stream media from outside your home network until this is resolved.

A problem has been detected with a core: A problem has been detected with a core component of Plex. Please visit the forums and provide your logs, as described here.
Channels may require plugins to be insta: Channels may require plugins to be installed alongside the media server. Click on the links below to download the installer for each plugin.

Or send videos to your queue by email: Ili pošalji video snimke u red putem email-a
Every link that you email to this addres: Svaka poveznica koju pošaljete emailom na ovu adresu biti će dodana u Vaš myPlex red. Dodajte ovaj email u Vaš adresa kako biste lakše mogli slati poveznice sa Vašeg iPhone, iPad, Android ili bilo kojeg drugog uređaja.

Let's start by giving your Plex server a: Let's start by giving your Plex server a friendly name so it can identify itself to other computers on the network. If you leave it blank, your computer name will be used.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Želite li nam pomoći da napravimo Plex boljim za sve? Skupljamo anonimne podatke koje koristimo za poboljšavanje usluge.
If you would like to receive announcemen: Ukoliko želite primati objave vezane uz Plex, unesite email adresu. Bez brige, nećemo Vas zatrpati porukama.
Sign in with a myPlex account to help yo: Sign in with a myPlex account to help your devices find each other, access your media from anywhere, and queue up videos from your browser to watch later in Plex.
Connecting your server to myPlex allows: Connecting your server to myPlex allows you to stream media outside your home network, and can help your devices find each other.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: Vidiš, to nije bilo tako teško? U ovom trenutku Plex neumorno radi kako bi sagradio tvoju kolekciju i učinio ju da izgleda predivno. Ispadne da je u tvom računalu jedan tucet miševa koji pedaliraju kao ludi.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to download some Plex apps!

While Plex Media Server will automatical: While Plex Media Server will automatically download updates for Plex/Web periodically, use "Check for Updates" to manually download updates.

Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Pomozi nam da prevedemo Plex/Web na tvoj jezik ovdje.

Populates the allowed networks setting w: Zauzima dozvoljene mrežne postavke sa 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. Ovo zahtjeva autentifikaciju drugih računala na lokalnoj mreži sa myPlexom prije pristupa poslužitelju.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Preferiraj AAC ispred MP3 kada pretvaraš audio. Neki uređaji poput Wii U isključivo podržavaju AAC audio.
This name will be used to identify this: Ovo ime će biti korišteno za indetifikaciju Vašeg media servera na drugim računalima na Vašoj mreži. Ako ovo ostavite prazno, koristiti ćemo ime Vašeg računala.
Send anonymous usage data to Plex: Šalji anonimne podatke o korištenju Plex-u.
This helps us improve your experience (f: Ovo nam pomaže kako bismo poboljšali Vaše iskustvo korištenja (npr., pomaže nam da bi bolje složili filmove i TV emisije).
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging

Enable Plex Media Server debug logging: Enable Plex Media Server debug logging
Your library will be updated automatical: Vaša kolekcija će biti automatski ažurirana kada detektiramo promjene u mapi kolekcije
The number of recent weeks used as the w: The number of recent weeks used as the window for On Deck
Empty trash automatically after every sc: Isprazni smeće automatski nakon svakog skeniranja
Include music sections in automatic upda: Uključi glazbene sekcije u automatsko ažuriranje
Large music sections may take a long tim: Velike glazbene sekcije mogu zahtjevati duže vrijeme za skeniranje
Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Capability checking ensures that plug-ins that are incompatible with this version of the server or the current client application you are using are hidden. Disabling capability checking is useful during development, but will enable access to plug-ins that may perform unreliably with certain client applications.
List of networks that are allowed withou: Popis mreža koje su dozvoljene bez autorizacije
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: Zarez razdvaja popis IP-a za mreže koje su dozvoljene u PMS bez autorizacije
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes wait for the transcoder to begin writing data
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Duration in minutes to use when transcoding something with an unknown duration
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Directory to use when transcoding for temporary files
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.
Automatically select audio tracks in you: Automatically select audio tracks in your preferred language when possible.

Protocol info string used in GetProtocol: Protocol info string used in GetProtocolInfo responses by the DLNA server
Number of seconds between DLNA media ren: Number of seconds between DLNA media renderer discovery requests
Enable the PMS DLNA server to report tim: Enable the PMS DLNA server to report timelines for video play activity

Expand the dashboard to use the full wid: Proširi radnu ploču kako bi se iskoristila puna širina stranice.

Sorry, you need a <a href='{1}' target=': Žao nam je, morate posjedovati PlexPass pretplatu za ovu značajku.
Sorry, you need a PlexPass subscription: Sorry, you need a PlexPass subscription to save some of these settings.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports MP4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Videos with subtitles cannot be played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio: Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio
Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be played directly. Browser support for AC3 audio is limited.
Plugins need to be installed on the comp: Plugins need to be installed on the computer that is running the media server.
Connecting your server makes it automati: Connecting your server makes it automatically available on your devices without any configuration of your router.
The path where local application data is: Putanja gdje se snimaju podaci za lokalnu aplikaciju
Size of IPC buffer (in bytes) when strea: Size of IPC buffer (in bytes) when streaming transcodes
